hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Ready to make the switch to solar? Get a free consultation and personalized quote. Our experts are here to answer your questions and help you save money with solar energy.

getInTouch.title: Get In Touch
getInTouch.subtitle: Multiple ways to reach our solar experts

area.title: Our Service Areas
area.caption: Don't see your city listed? Contact us - we're expanding our service areas regularly!
area.emergencySubtitle: Need urgent solar system support? Our emergency hotline is available 24/7 for existing customers.

common.title: Common Questions
common.subtitle: Quick answers to frequently asked questions
common.a1: Most residential installations take 1-3 days to complete.
common.a2: 25-year panel warranty, 10-year inverter warranty, and workmanship guarantee.
common.a3: Most customers save 50-90% on their electricity bills.
